alert.note: Alert for Mendocino Coast; Northern Humboldt Coast; Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southwestern Humboldt; Southwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued April 09 at 9:12PM PDT until April 10 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 29 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Mendocino Coast, Southwestern Mendocino Interior, Southeastern Mendocino Interior, Northern Humboldt Coast, Southwestern Humboldt and Southern Humboldt Interior Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.

area.areaDesc: Mendocino Coast; Northern Humboldt Coast; Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southwestern Humboldt; Southwestern Mendocino Interior
